```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Score download

```{r, echo = FALSE}

```

## Score summary

```{r}
scores <- read.table(params$file, header = TRUE, comment.char = "")
head(scores)
```
